summary: SOCIAL_LINKS.google was updated in frontend/src/lib/socialLinks.ts to a specific Google search/reviews URL, but the diff does not provide evidence that the footer button/link behavior (new tab + rel attributes) was verified/implemented, and additional unrequested project metadata/docs were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the footer 'Social Connect' area (the button labeled 'Review us on Google'), clicking the button opens the provided URL in a new tab (retaining target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer").
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no change to the footer component, and no snippet is provided demonstrating the link uses SOCIAL_LINKS.google with the required target/rel attributes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx but no diff shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: SOCIAL_LINKS.google equals the exact URL provided by the user (use exactly as provided, do not shorten/replace).
missing_requirements.reason: While SOCIAL_LINKS.google was changed, the BuildRequest does not include the literal user-provided URL, so exactness cannot be verified from the diff summary alone.
